line_1: Scarcely she breathes, her cheeks with anger flush,
line_2: O'er her whole frame deep spreads the crimson blush;

line_1: With b heat of wine, not youth they flush,
line_2: If still thy cheeks preserve a blush,

line_1: "They call'd it hectic; 't was a fiery flush,
line_2: " More fix'd and deeper than the maiden blush;

line_1: Bid his lip quiver, or his forehead flush?
line_2: One slight convulsion, or one transient blush
